doc.name: DragoÈ™ Dumitriu
doc.title: No child control, huge size, battery eater
doc.review: The game is playable, but its dangers are many. There is no way to prevent your kids from tapping the huge, inviting Facebook and G+ sharing buttons on the home screen. Unless you are into sharing every breath you take on social networks, avoid this game. It's also worth noting that the game is huge (400MB), that it downloads large amounts of data almost each time you start it, and that it drains the battery like nothing you've seen before.
